course_description: Students will be exposed to the practical aspects of working with small molecules, both organic and inorganic. Students will learn to synthesize compounds and analyze their characteristic properties such as structure, function, and purity. Students who withdraw from the laboratory course must withdraw from the co-requisite lecture course. *Exceptions to the withdrawal policy require Chemistry Department approval.
prerequisites:
CHEM_OX 202 & CHEM_OX 202L prerequisites  or equivalent transfer credit.
Student must enroll in CHEM_OX 203L first, then in CHEM_OX 203. Students must be enrolled in both courses or will be dropped at preregistration or Add/Drop/Swap.
